remarks: A homomorphism of left modules is ` K ` -linear.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lmhmlin.k $e |- K = ( Scalar ` S ) $.
lmhmlin.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lmhmlin.e $e |- E = ( Base ` S ) $.
lmhmlin.m $e |- .x. = ( .s ` S ) $.
lmhmlin.n $e |- .X. = ( .s ` T ) $.
lmhmlin $p |- ( ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) /\ X e. B /\ Y e. E ) -> ( F ` ( X .x. Y ) ) = ( X .X. ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
